issues.description: The problem statement specifies orderMeal(Meal) with return type void (UML at line 31 in problem_statement.md), but the solution implementation declares orderMeal(Meal) returning boolean. This mismatch may confuse students on the expected method signature and return behavior.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of orderMeal in SealSaloon.java to void to match the problem specification, or update the problem statement to specify a boolean return if that is intended.
